title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Zero-Touch Secret Rotation, now available for your third-party secrets (SEC230)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 零接触密钥轮换，现已支持第三方密钥 (SEC230)
abstract: Elevate your security posture with the new managed external secrets feature from AWS Secrets Manager – a zero-touch solution for third-party SaaS secret rotation. With increasing compliance requirements, relying on periodic manual intervention and complex custom Lamda functions for secret rotation is no longer sustainable. Learn how Fannie Mae, a leading US mortgage financing provider, streamlined their operations and enhanced security with this capability. Discover how to achieve scalable and secure-by-design secret management for your entire SaaS ecosystem, and how software vendors can get themself integrated with Secrets Manager.
abstract_cn: 通过 AWS Secrets Manager 的新托管外部密钥功能提升您的安全态势——这是一个用于第三方 SaaS 密钥轮换的零接触解决方案。随着合规要求的不断增加，依赖定期手动干预和复杂的自定义 Lambda 函数进行密钥轮换已不再可持续。了解美国领先的抵押贷款融资提供商房利美如何通过此功能简化运营并增强安全性。探索如何为整个 SaaS 生态系统实现可扩展且安全设计的密钥管理，以及软件供应商如何将自己与 Secrets Manager 集成。
